revision.comment: Created page with "{{Wireless embedded system |brand=John Deere |model=MowerPlus Smart Connector |revision=(PH85234863) |fcc_date=06/05/2018 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |type=IoT |fcc_id=2AA..."
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=John Deere |model=MowerPlus Smart Connector |revision=(PH85234863) |fcc_date=06/05/2018 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |type=IoT |fcc_id=2AAFX-PH85234863 |ic_id=11137A-PH85234863 |pwr_v=12 |eth_none=true |flags=Bluetooth LE, }} The ID Label document at the FCC describes this device as a "CAN2BLE Bridge" so it likely makes data from the CAN bus available via bluetooth to the John Deere MowerPlus app for tracking lawn care and mower maintenance.
===News=== * [https://www.deere.com/en_US/corporate/our_company/news_and_media/press_releases/2016/residential/2016march29-mowerplus-app.page ''John Deere Introduces App to Track Lawn Care and Maintenance'' at '''John Deere'''] (March 2, 2016)
